traits.name: Insanity
entries: Droki has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Droki deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Droki that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Droki doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Droki makes two attacks with his shortsword

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage. The sword is coated with serpent venom that wears off after the first hit. A target subjected to the venom must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
